enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: High-level attendance in the contact group on arrangements for intergovernmental meetings and spirited discussion on the format of the high-level segment led to speculation on the importance placed by governments on attracting a star cast of heads of State and ministers to the tenth anniversary of the UNFCCC.
Meanwhile, several delegates commented on the success of the in-session workshop on adaptation.
